dcterms:description: The HQ-WMCA dataset contains a wide variety of 2D, 3D, and partial attacks, collected with 14 different sensing modalities including RGB, NIR, SWIR, thermal, and depth channels. It is designed for evaluating presentation attack detection systems.
dcterms:title: HQ-WMCA

dcterms:description: Labeled Faces in the Wild is a dataset designed for face recognition research, containing images of faces collected from the web, annotated with labels.
dcterms:title: Labeled Faces in the Wild

dcterms:creator: A. George

dcterms:description: The Biometric Face Presentation Attack Detection dataset is used for training and evaluating models for detecting presentation attacks on biometric systems.
dcterms:title: Biometric Face Presentation Attack Detection

dcterms:description: The Face Anti-Spoofing Challenge Dataset is a collection of images and videos used to evaluate face anti-spoofing methods across different ethnicities.
dcterms:title: Face Anti-Spoofing Challenge Dataset
